subsection.title: SubSectioning
subsection.p: This is an example of a subsection with a little mathematics involved. this is a new sentence
A prime number is an integer greater than 1 that is divisible only by 1 and itself. The smallest prime number is 2 and the rest are necessarily odd:

Any integer greater than 1 that is not prime can be uniquely written as a product of primes. When such a number, like 42, is written as a product, 42=2\cdot 21, we say that 2\cdot 21 is a factorization of 42 and that 2 and 21 are factors. Note that factors divide the number evenly. We can continue to write factors as products until only a product of primes remains.
Therefore the prime factorization of 42 is 2\cdot 3\cdot 7.
